error.unauth: You're not properly logged in right now!

error.payment: Oh dear, I'm afraid there's been an error. We're sorry about that. Please contact kontakt@vivaconagua.org and include this payment ID.

not_found.headline: Ooops, unfortunately no suitable form was found
not_found.text:
Unfortunately, we have not found a suitable donation form.
Please send us a short message where the error occurred to kontakt@vivaconagua.org so that we can fix the problem.

headline.paid: THANK YOU FOR YOUR PAYMENT FOR VIVA CON AGUA
headline.donate: DONATE NOW FOR CLEAN DRINKING WATER
headline.thanks: THANK YOU FOR YOUR DONATION FOR CLEAN DRINKING WATER

information.label: Important information:
information.info_1: Monthly donations can be canceled at any time.
information.info_2: Your donation is tax deductible. You will receive a donation receipt in February next year.
information.info_3: Viva con Agua uses your data exclusively for the administration of donations. We do not pass them on to third parties.
information.info_4: Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V. is recognized as a non-profit organization by the Hamburg-Nord tax office. Tax number: 17/454/04711. Last notice dated 15.03.2024.

information_nwt.label: Important information:
information_nwt.info_1: For further information you can always contact kontakt@vivaconagua.org
information_nwt.info_2: As this is a participation fee, the amount is not tax deductible

information_mtg.info_3: Viva con Agua Arts will only use your data for donation management. We do not pass them on to third parties.
information_mtg.info_4: Viva con Agua ARTS gGmbH - VAT identification number according to §27 a VAT Act: DE304637764

example.1500: With this amount you will support us e.g. with at least 20 liters of soap for schools
example.2000: With this amount you will support us e.g. with at least one water filter for a family
example.5000: With this amount you will support us e.g. with at least 50 trees
example.8000: With this amount you will support us e.g. with at least one hygiene workshop at a school

mtg.100: With this you support us e.g. with at least one glass of water
mtg.500: With this you support us e.g. with at least one Spray Can
mtg.2500: With this you support us e.g. with at least one day's rent for a microphone
mtg.5000: With this you support us e.g. with at least one bucket of facade white
mtg.15000: With this you support us e.g. with at least paint and material for a complete wall area

icon.500: With 5 euros you support us e.g. with sanitary hygiene articles for one person for a whole year
icon.1000: With 10 euros you support us e.g. with hygiene kits for a whole family
icon.1500: With 15 euros you support us e.g. with at least 20 liters of soap for schools
icon.2000: 20€: provide access to clean drinking water through a new well for one person
icon.2500: With 25 euros you support us e.g. with at least one water filter for a family
icon.3500: With 35 euros, in South Africa a Football4WASH trainer can be trained and teach children about hygiene in a fun way
icon.5000: 50€: enable training in sustainable water management for one person
icon.10000: 100€: enable the training of 1 Health Extension Worker

label.donate: You want to donate a different amount? No problem!
label.pay: You want to give a different amount? No problem!

error.minAmount: Please select at least one amount from {0} {1}

nwt.sliderinfo: Info on pricing: 199€ would cover costs.  Then let's make it 50/50, for example. 50 per cent is on us and you add 50 per cent
nwt.infotext:
We are thrilled that you have been selected to join us at this year's network meeting.
Now only the last step is missing - the payment.
If you are one of the lucky ones who can come, please select the amount once below and click continue.
Attention: Please use a payment service provider under your name for the payment.

If, unfortunately, you were not selected:


This is only the payment system. Selected participants have already been notified. If you are not one of them, we are very sorry. Payment here does not lead to registration.

thanks.subheader: COOL THAT YOU ARE HERE AND THANK YOU FOR YOUR TRUST!

email.info: This is not a required field, but we will send the donation receipts by e-mail and would appreciate it if you could provide us with your e-mail address..

selectCountry.label: Please select in which currency you would like to donate

de.title: Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V.
de.subtitle: Our association in Germany

payment.email: We need your email address at this point to be able to make the donation with this payment provider.

de.single:
I authorize Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V. to collect payments from my account by direct debit. At the same time, I instruct my credit institution to accept the direct debit drawn from my account by Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V..
Note: I can demand reimbursement of the debited amount within eight weeks, beginning with the debit date. The conditions agreed with my credit institution shall apply.
de.subscription:
I authorize Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V. to collect payments from my account by direct debit on the 15th of the following month. At the same time, I instruct my credit institution to accept the direct debit drawn from my account by Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V.
Note: I can demand within eight weeks, beginning with the debit date, the refund of the debited amount. The terms and conditions agreed with my credit institution shall apply

mtg.single:
I authorize Viva con Agua Arts gGmbH to collect payments from my account by direct debit. At the same time I instruct my credit institution to honour the direct debit drawn on my account by Viva con Agua Arts gGmbH.
Note: I can demand reimbursement of the debited amount within eight weeks, beginning with the debit date. The conditions agreed with my credit institution apply.
mtg.subscription:
I authorize Viva con Agua Arts gGmbH to collect payments from my account by direct debit on the 15th of the following month. At the same time I instruct my credit institution to honour the direct debit drawn on my account by Viva con Agua Arts gGmbH.
Note: I can demand reimbursement of the debited amount within eight weeks, beginning with the debit date. The conditions agreed with my credit institution apply.

thanks.share: I have just donated {0} to Viva con Agua. Support projects for clean access to drinking water and basic sanitation with a donation!

example.default: enables for example in our project country Uganda, even more people to get access to clean drinking water
example.500: among other things, supported one person in our project country Uganda with sanitary hygiene articles for a whole year
example.1000: among other things, supported an entire family with hygiene kits in our project country Uganda
example.1500: among other things, provided at least 20 liters of soap for schools in our project country Uganda.
example.2000: donated among other things, a water filter to another family in our project country Uganda.
example.5000: planted among others things, in our project country Uganda at least 50 trees.
example.8000: facilitated among other things, another hygiene workshop at a school in our project country Uganda.

next.label: This is how it continues
next.email: You will receive a confirmation email from us immediately.
next.nwt:
You will receive a payment confirmation from us immediately.
We will reconcile the payments with the guest list and send you a final registration confirmation in the next few days.
Also, feel free to check your spam folder again if you don't receive it.
For more information you can always contact us at kontakt@vivaconagua.org.

We look forward to spending time together!
next.receipt:
You will receive your donation receipts in February next year.
If you need it sooner, you can always contact us at spenden@vivaconagua.org.
next.receipt_mtg: You will receive your donation receipt in February of the following year. If you need them sooner, please contact us at contact@millerntorgallery.org.

newsletter.text: In the meantime, you can sign up for our newsletter. Note: We currently only send our newsletter in German.
newsletter.success: Thank you for subscribing our newsletter!
